name: Crate Escape (itch)
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a metal crate? In this endless runner you can. Dodge roadblocks in hope to escape the factory. Obstacles are generated randomly, and as the game goes on, the difficulty increases.

Also, this is my first game, so I had no idea what I was doing when I made this lol.

CONTROLS:

A and D to move left and right.

ASSETS USED:

"Metal Cube" (https://skfb.ly/onVS6) by Onilak24 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

"RoadBlock" (https://skfb.ly/o67pE) by EXHALE is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
